text.div:
Telecommunication Expiration Reason

Code Description Comment Version
c Corrected The telecommunication address has been replaced with a corrected version. added v2.6
e Added in error The telecommunication address was incorrect and should never have been associated with the individual. added v2.6
m Moved The individual associated with the telecommunication address has moved and is no longer reachable at the address. added v2.6
n No longer in service The telecommunication address is no longer connected or available added v2.6
r On request The associated individual requested that the telecommunication address be removed from their record (though it may still be correct). added v2.6

name: v2 Telecommunication Expiration Reason
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0868 ( Telecommunication Expiration Reason)

extension.valueString: The telecommunication address has been replaced with a corrected version.
The telecommunication address was incorrect and should never have been associated with the individual.
The individual associated with the telecommunication address has moved and is no longer reachable at the address.
The telecommunication address is no longer connected or available
The associated individual requested that the telecommunication address be removed from their record (though it may still be correct).
